note: Months containing fewer than 500 survey respondents are excluded. Respondents were presented with a 1 to 5 scale, ranging from "Strongly agree" (1) to "Strongly disagree" (5). We consider responses of 1 or 2 to be in agreement with the statement.
title: Share among unvaccinated people who would get a COVID-19 vaccine this week if it was available to them
subtitle: Share of survey respondents who have not received a COVID-19 vaccine and who agree with the statement: "If a COVID-19 vaccine were made available to me this week, I would definitely get it."

display.name: Share of respondents who would get a COVID-19 vaccine if it was available to them this week
